Two discourses concerning the Holy Spirit, and His work the one, Of the Spirit as a comforter, the other, As He is the author of spiritual gifts ... / by ... John Owen. Owen, John, 1616-1683. Mather, Nathanael, 1631-1697. Owen, John, 1616-1683. Discourse of spiritual gifts.
[8], 277, [3], ciii-cxiv [cxvi] p.
Printed for William Marshall ..., London : 1693.
Errata: prelim. p. [8] and p. cxiv at end. Advertisement: p. [1]-[3] following p. 277. Preface signed: Nath. Mather ... 1692. Added t.p. on p. [103]: A discourse of spiritual gifts. "The application of the foregoing discourse" (caption title): p. ciii-cxiv. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======

[8], 277, [3], ciii-cxiv [cxvi] p.
